modName: Sword of Altair from Assassins Creed _ one-handed nonreplacer
summary: One-handed nonreplacer sword from Assassins Creed
descriptionHtml:
THIS WEAPON IS NOT A REPLACEMENT

Ever feelt like you wanted to wield the sword of one of the greatest assassins who has ever lived, well here\'s your chance with this latest mod created by Shrinkingcash and his fellow assistant PR95 who does the description writing.

How to obtain: This weapon is only avilible throu smithing so far and the recipe is unlocked along with the Ebony smithing perk.

Smithing Recipe: 1 Ebony ingot, 2 steel ingots, 1 leather stripe and 1 hawk feather.
Uppgrading requires 1 ebony ingot.

Instalation: Drag the data-folder into Skyrims main directory

I\'m well aware of the missing blood textures but will fix it in a future update.

Made by Shrinkingcash and his fellow assistant PR95 who does the description writing.

Btw am going to make a assassins creed dagger.
author: Shrinkingcash

files.name: Altairs sword
files.fileName: A backup to the main file-20143-1.rar
